banner.title: SYSTEM IN READ-ONLY MODE
banner.defaultAnnouncement: System is temporarily in read-only mode due to maintenance. All write operations are disabled.

admin.title: Emergency Lockdown Control
admin.subtitle: Activate system-wide read-only mode to block all uploads, downloads, and delete operations

activate.title: Activate Emergency Lockdown
activate.warning: WARNING: Activating lockdown will immediately block all write operations (uploads, downloads, deletes) for all users except administrators. Use this only in emergency situations such as virus detection, ransomware attack, or data breach.
activate.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to activate emergency lockdown? This will block all write operations for non-admin users immediately.

deactivate.title: Deactivate Emergency Lockdown
deactivate.description: The system is currently in lockdown mode. Click the button below to restore normal operations.
deactivate.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to deactivate emergency lockdown? This will restore normal write operations for all users.

form.reasonPlaceholder: Describe the reason for lockdown (internal use only, not shown to users)
form.reasonMinLength: Reason must be at least 10 characters
form.announcementPlaceholder: Enter the message that will be displayed to all users (explain why the system is in read-only mode)
form.announcementMinLength: Announcement must be at least 20 characters

dialog.title: Emergency Lockdown Active
dialog.description: The system is currently in read-only mode. Uploads, downloads, and deletion requests are temporarily unavailable.
dialog.contact: If you need urgent assistance, please contact a system administrator.
